mapper.sql: COUNT(*) AS "count" , DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "time", a.status AS "status"
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_order_info a where to_days(create_date) = to_days(now()) and a.order_status="1";
SELECT count(*) FROM t_order_info a WHERE date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') and a.`status`="1";

select c.`name` as "name", count(*) as "count" from t_coffee c JOIN t_coffee_map m on m.coffee_id = c.id JOIN t_order_details o on o.coffee_id = m.id JOIN t_order_info i on i.id = o.order_id and i.`status` = '1' GROUP BY c.`name`
